org.openbase.bco.ontology.lib.utility.sparql

Class StaticSparqlExpression

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openbase.bco.ontology.lib.utility.sparql.QueryExpression

  • public final class StaticSparqlExpression
extends Object
    This class contains static sparql expressions, which are important for the ontology update and ontology query. Please do not modify!
    Author:
    agatting on 10.03.17.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static String COUNT_ALL_TRIPLES
      Query to count all triples.

      SPARQL command to get the ending of the aggregation time frame.

      • QUERY_URIS

        public static final String QUERY_URIS
        Query selects all resources of another query. The resources are filtered by URI of bco.
        See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • getNullWhereExpression

        public static List<RdfTriple> getNullWhereExpression()
        Method returns a rdf triple, which all elements are null. This triple is used as where expression in sparql queries.
        Returns:
        a list with one rdf triple, which elements are all null.

      • getConnectionPhaseUpdateExpr

        public static String getConnectionPhaseUpdateExpr(String lastHeartBeatTimestamp)
        Method returns a sparql update string, which identifies and fill the latest connectionPhase instance of each unit. If a connectionPhase is incomplete, means the property 'hasLastConnection' is missing, the sparql update extends the connectionPhase with the 'hasLastConnection' and the given last heartBeat timestamp. Please do not modify!
        Parameters:
        lastHeartBeatTimestamp - The latest heartBeat timestamp.
        Returns:
        A sparql update string to repair incomplete connectionPhases.

      • selectObservations

        public static String selectObservations(String endTimestamp)
        Method returns a query, which selects all observations in the ontology.
        Parameters:
        endTimestamp - is the end timestamp (until) to locate the time frame.
        Returns:
        a sparql string to select observations.

      • getAllObservations

        public static String getAllObservations(String startTimestamp,
                                        String endTimestamp)
        Method returns a query string, which selects observation data in the ontology.
        Parameters:
        startTimestamp - is the start timestamp (from) to locate the time frame.
        endTimestamp - is the end timestamp (until) to locate the time frame.
        Returns:
        a sparql string to select observations.

      • getAllAggObs

        public static String getAllAggObs(String period,
                                  String dateTimeFrom,
                                  String dateTimeUntil)
        Method returns a query to select all aggregated observations in a time frame.
        Parameters:
        period - is the period of the aggregated observation.
        dateTimeFrom - is the timestamp from.
        dateTimeUntil - is the timestamp until.
        Returns:
        a sparql query to get aggregated observations.

      • deleteUnusedConnectionPhases

        public static String deleteUnusedConnectionPhases(String dateTimeUntil)

      • deleteUnusedAggObs

        public static String deleteUnusedAggObs(String period,
                                        String dateTimeFrom,
                                        String dateTimeUntil)
        Method returns a sparql update to delete all aggregated observations in a time frame.
        Parameters:
        period - is the period of the aggregated observation.
        dateTimeFrom - is the timestamp from.
        dateTimeUntil - is the timestamp until.
        Returns:
        a sparql update to delete aggregated observations.

      • deleteObservationOfTimeFrame

        public static String deleteObservationOfTimeFrame(String dateTimeFrom,
                                                  String dateTimeUntil)
        Method returns a sparql update to delete observations in a specific time frame.
        Parameters:
        dateTimeFrom - is the timestamp from.
        dateTimeUntil - is the timestamp until.
        Returns:
        the sparql update.
